name: OOCTD
description:
OOCTD is a sort of Tower Defense game with constantly changing Controls!

This game was created for the 2020 GMTK Game Jam. The theme was Out Of Control.

In OOCTD, you must defend your Space Station from an endless horde of drone attacks. The automated systems are down and the enemy keeps scrambling your commands.

You have to pay close attention to your console as it interprets the jumbled signals. Attempt to Take Control of three defense towers in an attempt to fend off the assault.

How to attempt to play
  • Requires keyboard
  • Select an asset by pressing 1, 2, or 3
    • Assets are colored coded
    • 1 selects blue asset
    • 2 selects orange asset
    • 3 selects green asset
    • Actions are color coded
      • Your display will highlight keys by color
        • You must press the corresponding keys on your physical keyboard
      • Green is rotate left
      • Blue is rotate right
      • Yellow is move left (blue asset only)
      • Magenta is move right (blue asset only)
      • Red is fire
        • Blue asset fires 'bullets'
        • Green and Blue assets fire lasers
          • Lasers are more powerful but have limited range
  • Your health is represented by a grid in the bottom right hand side
